name: Lightboxes UI
description: Ember.js web application that provides a user-friendly interface for sharing digital assets to external users without a Salsify ProductXM login. This is the front-end for the lightboxes module.

name: Lightbox
description: A feature in Salsify that enables sharing digital assets with external users who do not have a Salsify ProductXM login. Lightboxes provide a curated view of digital assets for external stakeholders.

name: Dandelion
description: The backend server that powers Salsify's product content management system. It serves as the API backend for various Salsify front-end applications including lightboxes-ui.
